numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The fingers of men do not rest on the smooth glass surface of phones.
3. Men do not send messages to the father of their children.
4. Men do not send messages to the mother of their children.
5. Women move their fingers gracefully across a keyboard.
6. Women write messages to their ancestors.
7. Long-distance voice calls occur more often among women than among men.
8. Parents must encourage their sons to talk on a phone.
